A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney owns ABC\, ESPN\, and many media outlets.  Do critics fear to put a damper on Disney's $200 million flop?  How else can you explain such high critic scores for a shallow\, and soulless sci-fi reboot?  This movie had the special effects\, the production values\, all the money in the world\, but it had no soul.  This movie is the Evil Empire of Star Wars movies\, and has the lowest return rate of audiences in the franchise.  Wait and rent it on DVD\, not worth top dollar in a theater.
